tags: None
review:
Previously I had visited this doctor and provided a low rating as the doctor suggested to examine my baby only with the medical file. I was bit disappointed as I had come from a far distance just to meet this doctor. 
This time met the doctor with all the required files and the doctor attended my baby with really good care and later explained me about the necessity of the medical file as why itâ€™s important. Now  I feel that I took a hasty decision in providing a low rating because thinking from the doctors perspective he was right as the medical file is really important. 
5 stars to the doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Newborn Jaundice,Consultation provided for newborns ,Pediatric Vaccinations,
review:
One of the finest,  coolest and friendly doctors I have ever met. It was a great journey since my baby born (Fortis La Femme) 2021 July till today the care and treatment given is flawless and un measurable. 

After somany years I met doctor who works in corporate hospitals suggest not to come to hospital for every small thing unnecessarily instead giving you strict instructions to visit immediately for anything ðŸ˜€ðŸ˜€..  He will make you so comfortable and become close to you as a friend or family, you feel that so quickly after couple of visits. We go to visit him by traveling an hour even we have multiple hospitals around in our area R.T Nagar, because we feel so authentic, trusted and treatment is value for fee.

Thanks a lot sir being associated with us!! I wish you to reach hights with your attitude and quality of work!!

Thank you Dr. Paras!
